articles.description: Capcom's dino-hunting live-service is holding an open beta next week, with the full game launching into Game Pass in July
articles.content: Looks like we won’t need to wait until Exoprimal’s 2040 setting to play the game, as Capcom’s live service dino-hunter is releasing on July 14th, now with a day one Game Pass launch. If that still se… [+2010 chars]

articles.author: Luke Plunkett
articles.title: Discord Introducing 'AI' Stuff Nobody Asked For, Or Needs - Kotaku
articles.description: From mods to art, the comms platform is squeezing machine learning into every corner of its service
articles.content: In a blog post published earlier today, Discorda communications platform, and nothing moreannounced plans to introduce what they call AI (but which should more accurately be called machine learning) … [+2263 chars]
